column5: Received this in my email today - some company in Tennessee is offering a free internet TV channel, with all fishing content. Interesting.    WAYPOINT TV LAUNCHES STREAMING VIDEO PLATFORM
Craig FYI  I typed the web site. All sites posted, Norton advise not safe to open. Have you check thier web site?
I was just on the site. Watched a couple of Lindners videos. No warnings came up for me, but I use a Mac.
I just watched an episode of Linders no warning came up on mine,HP elightbook laptop
CARE TO SHARE A LINK PLEASE. Thanks
no warnings for me on a acer http://www.waypointtv.com/#!/  love the idea of getting to watch what i want when i want
i am watch it on my kodi box

no warnings for me on a acer http://www.waypointtv.com/#!/  love the idea of getting to watch what i want when i want  Thanks HOW. Wow, lots on there. Thanks again.    i am watch it on my kodi box   Well Im looking on my box, cant find it. Thought you were my bud? LOL
Thanks HOW. Wow, lots on there. Thanks again.      Well Im looking on my box, cant find it. Thought you were my bud? LOL thats why I posted I found it on the box
LOL  Ya I found it. Watching sweet water right now.
Ok , I've searched and not finding it on any of the addons I use on Kodi  , which addon carries it?
I used google and just watched it on the tv.
Download KODI for free and you can watch all the free streaming fishing and anything else for that matter, for free!
How would you watch it on Apple TV?
There is an app for Apple TV.  Don't know if it's free or not.  I don't have an apple so I'm not sure which it is.

While looking last night , I did find this addon for Kodi, lots of match and carp/coarse fishing videos from Europe. I see the New Flyfisher and some other north american shows.  It needs you to have the Youtube addon  installed as most of this is on there. This video shows installing the repo and addon.
Kodi is available for your home PC ...many devices! and free!  enables free TV...grey area as well.  https://kodi.tv/download/
Sweet site! I just watched a few Linder's during break at work and everything was fine. We have very tight security here.

Can kodi work on your iPhone 6s ?? I did also watch a few of Lindners shows on my puter at work and it has tight security as well and it worked fine ..... Just wondering if it will download to my phone so I can watch fishing shows on it from wifi ??
Similar to Waypoint TV but with more hunting content  http://www.carbontv.com/
